script: You will be given three messages from different people Julie-Anne McAreavey-Kilroe, Mark Garcia, and Anthony Becker.
Anthony Becker: Bring to the meeting a way to escape quickly over land.
Mark Garcia: We will rendezvous where the trains are supplied.
Julie-Anne McAreavey-Kilroe: The time we will meet is when the sun starts its travel across the sky.

Given the clandestine messages you have received, decypher their content and tell me when and where you think the meeting is going to happen and what you think you should bring. If you're unable to give a concrete time, place or item, give at least some examples.
